page.title: 12HOUSING
page.content: In Pennington there are these Council developments Pound Road,Pennington Oval,Howard's Mead(which are flats), Efford Way and Bays Road.The first two are old having been built in the 1950' s.The third was built in the 1960's. The fourth was built in the early 1970's.The fifth was built in 1981. There are several developments of private properties built at various times from the 1950's and 60's onwards. Two thirds of the children attending our school come from residential homes and one third come from council homes. Included in the Council developments mentioned above are flats for young couples, old people and an old people's home called Solent Mead. The village of Everton has no Council properties at all.It comprises of private properties built in the
